148  void Load(const std::string& fileName) {
149  set(::LoadFont(fileName.c_str()));
150  if (!IsReady()) {
151  throw new RaylibException("Failed to load Font with from file: " + fileName);
152  }
153  }
154 
165  void Load(const std::string& fileName, int fontSize, int* fontChars, int charCount) {
166  set(::LoadFontEx(fileName.c_str(), fontSize, fontChars, charCount));
167  if (!IsReady()) {
168  throw new RaylibException("Failed to load Font with from file with font size: " + fileName);
169  }
170  }
171 
172  void Load(const ::Image& image, ::Color key, int firstChar) {
173  set(::LoadFontFromImage(image, key, firstChar));
174  if (!IsReady()) {
175  throw new RaylibException("Failed to load Font with from image");
176  }
177  }
178 
179  void Load(const std::string& fileType, const unsigned char* fileData, int dataSize, int fontSize,
180  int *fontChars, int charsCount) {
181  set(::LoadFontFromMemory(fileType.c_str(), fileData, dataSize, fontSize, fontChars,
182  charsCount));
183  if (!IsReady()) {
184  throw new RaylibException("Failed to load Font " + fileType + " with from file data");
185  }
186  }
187 
191  bool IsReady() {
192  return baseSize > 0;
193  }
194 
198  inline Font& DrawText(const std::string& text, ::Vector2 position, float fontSize,
199  float spacing, ::Color tint = WHITE) {
200  ::DrawTextEx(*this, text.c_str(), position, fontSize, spacing, tint);
201  return *this;
202  }
203 
207  inline Font& DrawText(const std::string& text, int posX, int posY, float fontSize,
208  float spacing, ::Color tint = WHITE) {
209  ::DrawTextEx(*this, text.c_str(),
210  { static_cast<float>(posX), static_cast<float>(posY) },
211  fontSize, spacing, tint);
212  return *this;
213  }
214 
215  inline Font& DrawText(
216  const std::string& text,
217  ::Vector2 position,
218  ::Vector2 origin,
219  float rotation,
220  float fontSize,
221  float spacing,
222  ::Color tint = WHITE) {
223  ::DrawTextPro(*this, text.c_str(),
224  position, origin,
225  rotation, fontSize,
226  spacing, tint);
227  return *this;
228  }

233  inline Font& DrawText(int codepoint,
234  ::Vector2 position,
235  float fontSize,
236  ::Color tint = { 255, 255, 255, 255 }) {
237  ::DrawTextCodepoint(*this, codepoint, position, fontSize, tint);
238  return *this;
239  }

244  inline Font& DrawText(const int *codepoints,
245  int count, ::Vector2 position,
246  float fontSize, float spacing,
247  ::Color tint = { 255, 255, 255, 255 }) {
248  ::DrawTextCodepoints(*this,
249  codepoints, count,
250  position, fontSize,
251  spacing, tint);
252  return *this;
253  }

258  inline Vector2 MeasureText(const std::string& text, float fontSize, float spacing) const {
259  return ::MeasureTextEx(*this, text.c_str(), fontSize, spacing);
260  }
261 
265  inline int GetGlyphIndex(int character) const {
266  return ::GetGlyphIndex(*this, character);
267  }
268 
272  inline ::Image ImageText(const std::string& text, float fontSize,
273  float spacing, ::Color tint) const {
274  return ::ImageTextEx(*this, text.c_str(), fontSize, spacing, tint);
275  }
276 
277  private:
278  void set(const ::Font& font) {
279  baseSize = font.baseSize;
280  glyphCount = font.glyphCount;
281  glyphPadding = font.glyphPadding;
282  texture = font.texture;
283  recs = font.recs;
284  glyphs = font.glyphs;
285  }
286 };
